Morse code: One could learn Morse code and use it to communicate via telegraph wires or even through a flashlight and mirror.
Sign language: If all phones stopped working, people could learn sign language and use it to communicate through video calls or in person.
Solar-powered radios: Solar-powered radios could be used to communicate long distance, as long as there are still functioning power grids or transmitters.
Carrier pigeons: Carrier pigeons could be used to deliver messages, although this would be a slower and less reliable method of communication.
Ham radios: Ham radios could be used to communicate long distance, as long as there are still functioning power grids or transmitters.
